stages.name: Backlog
stages.title: Backlog
stages.description: Collect and prioritize new tasks and requirements. Review incoming requests and organize them for development.

stages.name: In Progress
stages.title: In Progress
stages.description: Active development phase where tasks are being worked on by team members. Code is written and features are implemented.

stages.name: Review
stages.title: Code Review
stages.description: Peer review process to ensure code quality, security, and adherence to standards. Includes testing and feedback.

stages.name: Done
stages.title: Completed
stages.description: Tasks that have been completed, tested, and deployed to production. Ready for client delivery.

stages.name: Ideas
stages.title: Content Ideas
stages.description: Brainstorm and research content ideas. Gather topics, keywords, and create content brief for writers.

stages.name: Writing
stages.title: Content Writing
stages.description: Create the actual content based on the brief. Write articles, blog posts, or other content materials.

stages.name: Editing
stages.title: Content Review & Editing
stages.description: Review content for grammar, style, accuracy, and brand consistency. Make necessary revisions and improvements.

stages.name: Published
stages.title: Content Published
stages.description: Content has been published to the appropriate channels and is live for the audience.

stages.name: New Leads
stages.title: Lead Generation
stages.description: Initial contact with potential clients. Capture lead information and qualify prospects for further engagement.

stages.name: Discovery
stages.title: Discovery Call
stages.description: Conduct discovery sessions to understand client needs, requirements, and project scope. Gather detailed information.

stages.name: Proposal
stages.title: Proposal Creation
stages.description: Create detailed project proposal including scope, timeline, pricing, and terms. Await client approval.

stages.name: Active Client
stages.title: Active Client
stages.description: Client has signed the contract and project is underway. Regular communication and project management.
